title: Last Days of Malcolm X (1981, History Movie) Morgan Freeman |  directed by Woodie King Jr.

sources.title: Last Days of Malcolm X (1981, History Movie) Morgan Freeman |  directed by Woodie King Jr.
sources.description:
After breaking ties with the Nation of Islam, Malcolm X became a man marked for death... and it was just a matter of time before his enemies closed in. Despite death threats and intimidation, Malcolm marched on - continuing to spread the word of equality and brotherhood right up until the moment of his brutal and untimely assassination. Highlighted by newsreel footage and interviews, this is the story of the last twenty-four hours of the life of Malcolm X.

Original title: Death of a Prophet (1981) AKA:  Last Days of Malcolm X

This film is subtitled in many languages.

Director & Writer: Woodie King Jr.
Stars: Morgan Freeman, Yolanda King, Mansoor Najee-ullah  
Genres: Classics, Drama, History

Featuring the music of jazz percussionist Max Roach.


@CultCinemaClassics
